name: Turn 'Em Off!
description:
Turn 'Em Off Controls:
  • Move: Arrow Keys or WASD
  • Select: A Button
  • Pause Menu: Start Button
  • Cancel: B Button

Turn 'Em Off! is a brain-teasing assembly of puzzles where there is but one goal - turn all of the lights off. Each light when turned on or off will flip the states of the ones around it. Can you finish all 100 puzzles?

Features:
  • 100 Progressively Perplexing Puzzles to solve in a 3x3 format
  • Random Mode - You never know what you're going to get!
  • A "Par" is set for each level to push you to find the quickest solution
  • Save Game (with Data Clear function)

Art & Code: Pearacidic
Special Thanks: Salt and Pixel
